workflow.name: Automate YouTube thumbnail creation & social publishing with Templated.io & Blotato
workflow.description:
# üí• Automate YouTube thumbnail creation from video links (with templated.io)

![Workflow Overview](https://www.dr-firas.com/templated.io.png)

## Who is this for?
This workflow is designed for **content creators**, **YouTubers**, and **automation enthusiasts** who want to automatically generate stunning YouTube thumbnails and streamline their publishing workflow ‚Äî all within **n8n**.

If you regularly post videos and spend hours designing thumbnails manually, this automation is built for you.

---

## What problem is this workflow solving?
Creating thumbnails is time-consuming ‚Äî yet crucial for video performance.  
This workflow completely automates that process:

- No more manual design.
- No more downloading screenshots.
- No more repetitive uploads.

In less than 2 minutes, you can refresh your entire YouTube thumbnail library and make your channel look brand new.

---

## What this workflow does
Once activated, this workflow can:

‚úÖ Receive YouTube video links via **Telegram**  
‚úÖ Extract metadata (title, description, channel info) via **YouTube API**  
‚úÖ Generate a **custom thumbnail automatically** using **Templated.io**  
‚úÖ Upload the new thumbnail to **Google Drive**  
‚úÖ Log data in **Google Sheets**  
‚úÖ Send **email and Telegram notifications** when ready  
‚úÖ Create and publish **AI-generated social posts** on **LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter** via **Blotato**

**Bonus:** You can re-create dozens of YouTube covers in minutes ‚Äî saving up to **5 hours per week** and around **$500/month** in manual design effort.

---

## Setup
1Ô∏è‚É£ Get a YouTube Data API v3 key from **Google Cloud Console**  
2Ô∏è‚É£ Create a **Templated.io** account and get your API key + template ID  
3Ô∏è‚É£ Set up a **Telegram bot** using @BotFather
4Ô∏è‚É£ Create a **Google Drive folder** and copy the folder ID  
5Ô∏è‚É£ Create a **Google Sheet** with columns: Date, Video ID, Video URL, Title, Thumbnail Link, Status  
6Ô∏è‚É£ Get your **Blotato API key** from the dashboard  
7Ô∏è‚É£ Connect your **social media accounts** to Blotato  
8Ô∏è‚É£ Fill all credentials in the **Workflow Configuration** node  
9Ô∏è‚É£ Test by sending a YouTube URL to your Telegram bot

---

## How to customize this workflow
- Replace the **Templated.io template ID** with your own custom thumbnail layout  
- Modify the **OpenAI node prompts** to change text tone or style  
- Add or remove **social platforms** in the Blotato section  
- Adjust the **wait time** (default: 5 minutes) based on template complexity  
- Localize or translate the generated captions as needed

---

## Expected Outcome
With one Telegram message, you‚Äôll receive:
- A professional custom thumbnail
- An instant email + Telegram notification
- A Google Drive link with your ready-to-use design

And your social networks will be automatically updated ‚Äî no manual uploads.

---

## Credits
- Thumbnail generation powered by **[Templated.io](https://templated.io/?utm_campaign=drfiras)**  
- Social publishing powered by **[Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas)**  
- Automation orchestrated via **n8n**  

---

### üëã Need help or want to customize this?
üì© Contact: [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/)  
üì∫ YouTube: [@DRFIRASS](https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)  
üöÄ Workshops: [Mes Ateliers n8n](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)


### üé• [Watch This Tutorial](https://youtu.be/hrR4cjObjD4)

![templated logo](https://www.dr-firas.com/templated.png)

---
üìÑ **Documentation**: [Notion Guide](https://automatisation.notion.site/Automate-YouTube-thumbnail-creation-from-video-links-2953d6550fd98063b9b9f9c8ce3b05fe?source=copy_link)

### Need help customizing?
Contact me for consulting and support : [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCriIQI8uaoEro5FEnOpeidQ) / [üöÄ Mes Ateliers n8n  ](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)

values.content: You are a social media expert creating viral posts for YouTube promotions. Write engaging, platform-optimized captions.

You are an expert French copywriter who specializes in creating short, punchy, and visually effective YouTube thumbnail texts.
Your goal is to write 4 concise and impactful text elements in French, based on the provided YouTube video title, description, and channel context.
Keep the phrasing visually strong and emotionally engaging ‚Äî it must capture attention at first glance.
Avoid emojis, hashtags, and punctuation except when necessary for readability.
Each phrase should be formatted as plain text (no markdown, no quotes).

=Based on the following information:

Video Title: {{ $json.title }}

Video Description: {{ $json.description }}

Channel Name: {{ $json.channelTitle }}

Generate 4 text elements for a YouTube thumbnail in French:

Main Title (Top) ‚Äî 3 strong words maximum that summarize the main idea or hook. maximum 20 characters.

Secondary Title (Center) ‚Äî 4 words maximum that create curiosity or highlight the benefit of the video. maximum 20 characters.

Bottom Title (Footer) ‚Äî a short supportive phrase or promise related to the topic. maximum 20 characters.

Label (Top-Right) ‚Äî one single keyword describing the type of content (e.g. ‚ÄúTutoriel‚Äù, ‚ÄúAstuce‚Äù, ‚ÄúWorkflow‚Äù, ‚ÄúCours‚Äù, ‚ÄúFormation‚Äù).

Constraints:

All outputs must be in French.

Use natural, human language that feels like it belongs on a modern YouTube thumbnail.

Avoid repeating the exact same words as in the video title ‚Äî paraphrase creatively.

Output in this JSON structure:

{
  "main_title": "...",
  "center_title": "...",
  "bottom_title": "...",
  "label": "..."
}

parameters.content:
# üöÄ Automate YouTube thumbnail creation

### üé• Watch This Tutorial

@[youtube](CenAtzPceQU)

This workflow automates YouTube thumbnail generation and social media distribution. Send a YouTube URL via Telegram, and the workflow will:

‚úÖ Extract video metadata from YouTube API
‚úÖ Generate custom thumbnail using [templated.io](https://templated.io/?utm_campaign=drfiras)
‚úÖ Store thumbnail in Google Drive
‚úÖ Log activity in Google Sheets
‚úÖ Create AI-powered social media posts
‚úÖ Publish to LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter
‚úÖ Send notifications via Email and Telegram

## üì§ STEP 1: üì± Telegram Trigger: Receives YouTube URLs from users

‚öôÔ∏è Workflow Configuration: Central hub for all API keys and settings

Required fields:
‚Ä¢ youtubeApiKey - Get from Google Cloud Console
‚Ä¢ templatedApiKey - Get from [templated.io](https://templated.io/?utm_campaign=drfiras) dashboard
‚Ä¢ templatedTemplateId - Your thumbnail template ID
‚Ä¢ googleDriveFolderId - Target folder for thumbnails
‚Ä¢ googleSheetsId - Spreadsheet for logging
‚Ä¢ emailRecipient - Notification email address
‚Ä¢ blotatoApiKey - Blotato API credentials
‚Ä¢ linkedinAccountId, facebookPageId, twitterAccountId

## üì§ STEP 2: üé® Generate Thumbnail: Sends POST request to [templated.io](https://templated.io/?utm_campaign=drfiras) 
API with video title and description to generate custom thumbnail

‚è≥ Wait for Rendering: Pauses workflow for 5 minutes 
to allow [templated.io](https://templated.io/?utm_campaign=drfiras) to complete thumbnail generation

‚¨áÔ∏è Download Thumbnail: Fetches the generated thumbnail image 
file from [templated.io](https://templated.io/?utm_campaign=drfiras) response URL and stores as binary data

Note: Adjust wait time based on your template complexity

## üì§ STEP 3: üìß Send Gmail: Sends email notification with:
‚Ä¢ Subject: YouTube Thumbnail Generated + video title
‚Ä¢ HTML body with video details
‚Ä¢ Thumbnail attachment
‚Ä¢ Google Drive link

‚òÅÔ∏è Upload to Google Drive: Uploads thumbnail to specified 

üí¨ Send Telegram Notification: Sends thumbnail with:
‚Ä¢ Video title
‚Ä¢ Google Drive link
‚Ä¢ Success confirmation message

üìã INSTALLATION CHECKLIST

1Ô∏è‚É£ Get YouTube Data API v3 key from Google Cloud Console
2Ô∏è‚É£ Create [templated.io](https://templated.io/?utm_campaign=drfiras) account and get API key + template ID
3Ô∏è‚É£ Set up Telegram bot using @BotFather
4Ô∏è‚É£ Create Google Drive folder and copy folder ID from URL
5Ô∏è‚É£ Create Google Sheets with columns: Date, Video ID, Video URL, Title, Thumbnail Link, Status
6Ô∏è‚É£ Get Blotato API key from dashboard
7Ô∏è‚É£ Connect social media accounts to Blotato and get account IDs
8Ô∏è‚É£ Fill all values in Workflow Configuration node
9Ô∏è‚É£ Test with a YouTube URL via Telegram

## üì¨ Need Help or Want to Customize This?
**Contact me for consulting and support:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)  / [üöÄ Mes Ateliers n8n  ](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)

## üì§ STEP 4: PUBLISHING

### Install the Blotato [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) Node in n8n (Community Nodes)
1. In n8n, open **Settings ‚Üí Community Nodes**.  
2. Click **Install**, then add: `@blotato/n8n-nodes-blotato`.  
3. Log in to **Blotato**.  
4. Go to **Settings ‚Üí API Keys**.  
5. In n8n ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New**.  
6. Choose **Blotato API** 
(provided by the community node you installed).
